Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of times Hillary Clinton lied to the FBI.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Hillary Clinton lied to the FBI many times.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Hillary Clinton lied to the FBI without providing concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict provides an alternative explanation by stating that the head of the FBI at the time, James Comey, told Congress there was no basis to conclude that Clinton lied to the FBI.
